articles.title: Euro zone slips into recession after Germany, Ireland revisions - Reuters
articles.description: The euro zone economy was in a technical recession in the first three months of 2023, data from European statistics agency Eurostat showed on Thursday, after downward revisions of growth in both the first quarter and the final quarter of 2022.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, June 8 (Reuters) - The euro zone economy was in a technical recession in the first three months of 2023, data from European statistics agency Eurostat showed on Thursday, after downward rev… [+2435 chars]
